Components.Lexical.SymbolStyleCustomizer

Interface ISymbolStyleCustomizerComp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPAMOJAComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSymbolStyleCustomizerComp

    public interface ISymbolStyleCustomizerComp
extends IPAMOJAComponent
    Interface providing services for interacting with other components, like Grammar, Language and RichTextView.
